pr_title: [Seneye] Bug fix for using Pond or Home sensors.

timeline.message:
[Seneye] Bug fix for using Pond or Home sensors.

This is a bug fix for Seneye binding when using Pond or Home Sensors.
Previously the binding would fail as it would try and pull readings for
Channels that didn't exist on these sensors.

Signed-off-by: MickUrsell  <bindings@mru-photography.co.uk>

timeline.bodyText: Maybe log what type 1,2 or 3 actually is ? Pond/Home/Reef
timeline.author: nikotanghe

replies.bodyText:
Hi Niko,
Many thanks for the feedback. I have changed the log as suggested.
This binding has been great for me, thanks for creating it.
replies.author: MickUrsell

timeline.message:
[Seneye] changed the log description of sensor

Logs now show name of sensor type being updated, following review


Signed-off-by: MickUrsell <bindings@mru-photography.co.uk>

timeline.author: cpmeister
